_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities of an exquisite ascetic o: Usually using only what they’ve been invited to accept
Treating other spiritual practitioners agreeably by way of body, speech, and mind, and usually presenting them with agreeable things
Being healthy, so the various unpleasant feelings usually don’t come up
Getting the four absorptions when they want, without trouble or difficulty
Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
Various unpleasant feelings [an5.104:4.1: Stemming from the conjunction of bile, phlegm, and wind
Caused by not taking care of themselves
